text: was a Japanese supercentenarian who was the oldest verified living person following the death of Nabi Tajima on April 21, 2018 until she died three months later.Giappone, morta nonna Nabi Tajima: era la pi√π vecchia del mondo She was born in the Kanagawa prefecture on May 2, 1901. == Longevity milestones == * September 15, 2017 - Violet Brown died. Chiyo Miyako, aged 116 years and 136 days, become the world's 2nd oldest living person. * December 15, 2017 - Ana Vela-Rubio of Spain died. Chiyo Miyako became the last verified surviving person born in 1901. * April 21, 2018 - Nabi Tajima died. Chiyo Miyako, aged 116 years and 354 days, become the world's oldest living verified person.Table C - World's Oldest Person (WOP) Titleholders Since 1955 Gerontology Research Group * May 2, 2018 - Chiyo Miyako became the 8th verified person in history to reach age 117, and the 3rd Japanese person to do so (1st place was Misao Okawa and 2nd place was Nabi Tajima). * May 30, 2018 - With the age of 117 years and 28 days, surpassed the lifespan of Misao Okawa to become the 2nd-oldest Japanese person ever. * July 22, 2018 - Died at the age of 117 years and 81 days in Yokohama, Japan due to natural causes - After Chiyo's death, Kane Tanaka became the world's oldest verified person. == References == Category:1901 births Category:Japanese supercentenarians Category:2018 deaths
